description: APEX-MD V2 Enhanced — Advanced WhatsApp Bot with AI, Group Management, Downloads, and Auto Error Handling. Built with Baileys & Gemini AI.

SESSION_ID.description: Mega.nz session file link or code (e.g. https://mega.nz/file/xxxxx)

PHONE_NUMBER.description: WhatsApp phone number for pairing code (e.g. 94701391585)

USE_PAIRING_CODE.description: Use pairing code instead of QR code to connect (true / false)

MONGODB.description: MongoDB connection URI for user/group/warning database (e.g. mongodb+srv://user:pass@cluster.mongodb.net/dbname)

OWNER_NAME.description: Display name of the bot owner

OWNER_NUMBER.description: Owner WhatsApp number (e.g. 94701391585). Used for startup & error notifications

SUDO.description: Comma-separated list of owner/sudo WhatsApp numbers (e.g. 94701391585,94771189323)

MODE.description: Bot access mode — public (everyone), private (owner only), inbox (DM only), groups (groups only)

GEMINI_API.description: Google Gemini API key for .ai command & auto error AI solutions (get from https://makersuite.google.com/app/apikey)

ALIVE_IMG.description: Image URL shown when .alive command is used

ALIVE_MSG.description: Text shown when .alive command is used

MENU_IMG.description: Image URL shown in the .menu command

AUTO_READ.description: Auto mark incoming messages as read (true / false)

AUTO_STATUS_READ.description: Auto read other people's WhatsApp statuses (true / false)

AUTO_TYPING.description: Show typing indicator before replying (true / false)

AUTO_RECORDING.description: Show recording indicator before replying (true / false)

ANTILINK_ENABLED.description: Default antilink protection state for new groups (true / false)

ANTILINK_ACTION.description: Default action when a link is detected — kick, warn, or delete

WELCOME_ENABLED.description: Default welcome message state for new groups (true / false)

GOODBYE_ENABLED.description: Default goodbye message state for new groups (true / false)

AUTO_STICKER.description: Auto convert images to stickers (true / false)

MAX_DOWNLOAD_SIZE.description: Maximum allowed download size in MB

AUDIO_QUALITY.description: Default audio download quality in kbps (e.g. 128, 192, 320)

SPAM_COUNT.description: Number of messages in the time window before a user is flagged as spam

BAN_TIME.description: Auto-ban duration in seconds when spam is detected

ANTI_CALL.description: Block incoming calls to the bot (true / false)

ANTI_BOT.description: Block other bots from interacting with this bot (true / false)

RATE_LIMIT_MAX.description: Maximum commands allowed per user within the rate limit window

RATE_LIMIT_WINDOW.description: Rate limit time window in milliseconds (e.g. 60000 = 1 minute)

TIME_ZONE.description: Server timezone for timestamps (e.g. Asia/Colombo, Asia/Kolkata)

DEBUG.description: Enable debug logging in terminal (true / false)

PORT.description: HTTP server port (used by health-check endpoint)

WEATHER_API.description: Weather API key (bot uses wttr.in by default, so this is optional)

TRANSLATE_API.description: Translation API key (bot uses translate-google by default)

REMOVE_BG_API.description: Remove.bg API key for background removal

IMGBB_API.description: ImgBB API key for image hosting

HUGGINGFACE_API.description: Hugging Face API key for AI model access
